    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_appclient.ScopeChecker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>var scopeName = "sn_devstudio";
var answer = new ScopeChecker().isStoreApp(scopeName); // boolean
gs.info("scope " + scopeName + " is a store app? " + answer);

var sysId = new ScopeChecker().getSysIdByScopeName(scopeName); // string
gs.info("scope " + scopeName + " sys_id: " + sysId);</description>
        <name>ScopeChecker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ScopeChecker = Class.create();
ScopeChecker.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	getSysIdByScopeName: function(scopeName) {
		if (gs.nil(scopeName) || "global" == scopeName)
			return null;
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_store_app");
		if (!gr.isValid())
			return null;
		
		gr.addQuery("scope", scopeName);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next() && gr.getRowCount() == 1)
			return gr.sys_id.toString();
		
		return null;
	},
	
	isStoreApp: function(scopeName) {
		var sys_id = this.getSysIdByScopeName(scopeName);
		return !gs.nil(sys_id);
	},
	
    type: 'ScopeChecker'
};]]></script>
